biotools.summary:
A DNA methylome dataset generator for user-specified cancer type based on conditional variational autoencoder.

methCancer-gen is a deep neural network-based tool for generating DNA methylome dataset based on a user-specified cancer-type.

bioschemas.name: methCancer-gen
